# Docker Docs

- [Containerize an app with Docker tutorial](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/docker/build-container.md): In this tutorial, you learn how to containerize a .NET application with Docker.
- [.NET container images](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/docker/container-images.md): Learn about the various .NET container images available on Docker Hub and how they're used for different scenarios.
- [Introduction to Docker](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/docker/introduction.md): This article provides an introduction and overview to Docker containers in the context of a .NET application.
